dcterms:description: The dataset contains the CDS term-structure for Ford Inc., which includes par spreads associated with CDS of various maturities, extracted from Bloomberg.
dcterms:title: CDS term-structure of Ford Inc.

dcterms:description: Market quotes for CDS options derived from market data, used in the context of pricing CDS options.
dcterms:title: Market quotes for CDS options

dcterms:description: The hazard rate function h(t) for CDS is described in the context of the CDS model from ISDA, extracted from market prices.
dcterms:title: Hazard rate function h(t) for CDS

dcterms:creator: Vrins
Brigo
dcterms:description: Exposure processes for CVA calculations, referenced as being used in previous works by Vrins (2017) and Brigo and Vrins (2018).
dcterms:title: Exposure processes for CVA calculations

dcterms:description: Parameters for the CIR model discussed in the context of calibration, derived from the analysis of the CDS term-structure.
dcterms:title: Parameters for the CIR model
